larry.name: LineageOS
changelog: Updated blobs and vendor patch from CPH2467_14.0.0.1320(EX01)
notes: You need to be on latest stock rom before proceeding
Take a backup of your data as this process might erase /data partition

[warning]Before following these instructions please ensure that the device is currently using the latest firmware version. Otherwise flash the latest stock firmware before continuing further[/warning]
Follow instructions carefully for flashing
MindTheGapps preferred for gapps (can try others too, MTG is the tested one)
issues: Nothing found so far. Report with proper logs if you finds any
flashingSteps: [warning]The provided instructions are for flashing this build. These will only work if you follow every section and step precisely. Do not continue after something fails![/warning]
Download all 4 files listed above (Rom, boot, dtbo, vendor_boot)
Reboot to bootloader
Flash the downloaded image files to your device by typing:
[command]fastboot flash boot boot.img[/command]
[command]fastboot flash dtbo dtbo.img[/command]
[command]fastboot flash vendor_boot vendor_boot.img[/command]
After flashing all three files, reboot to recovery from bootloader mode using volume down keys and selecting recovery mode
Format data (ignore if recovery complains about metadata type)
Select apply update > install using adb
Connect device to computer and type the following command by replacing with the filename of the zip
[command]adb sideload lineage***.zip[/command]
After flash completed, recovery will ask to reboot to recovery if in case u need to flash any other zips like magisk, gapps etc. Proceed accordingly
Format data once again after everything completed
Now you successfully flashed the rom. Boot into the rom and enjoy

larry.name: LineageOS
changelog: Fixed super partition size and alligned with stock
Switched to common partition reserved sizes
Fixed conference call with JIO sim
notes: You need to be on latest stock rom before proceeding
Use the mentioned recovery to install
Take a backup of your data as this process will erase /data partition

[warning]Before following these instructions please ensure that the device is currently using the latest firmware version. Otherwise flash the latest stock firmware before continuing further[/warning]
Follow instructions carefully for flashing
MindTheGapps preferred for gapps (can try others too, MTG is the tested one)
issues: Nothing found so far. Report with proper logs if you finds any
flashingSteps: [warning]The provided instructions are for flashing this build. These will only work if you follow every section and step precisely. Do not continue after something fails![/warning]
Download all 4 files listed above (Rom, boot, dtbo, vendor_boot)
Reboot to bootloader
Flash the downloaded image files to your device by typing:
[command]fastboot flash boot boot.img[/command]
[command]fastboot flash dtbo dtbo.img[/command]
[command]fastboot flash vendor_boot vendor_boot.img[/command]
After flashing all three files, reboot to recovery from bootloader mode using volume down keys and selecting recovery mode
Format data (ignore if recovery complains about metadata type)
Select apply update > install using adb
Connect device to computer and type the following command by replacing with the filename of the zip
[command]adb sideload lineage***.zip[/command]
After flash completed, recovery will ask to reboot to recovery if in case u need to flash any other zips like magisk, gapps etc. Proceed accordingly
Format data once again after everything completed
Now you successfully flashed the rom. Boot into the rom and enjoy
prevbuild: Download all 5 files listed above (Rom, boot, dtbo, vendor_boot, super_empty)
Reboot to bootloader
Wipe super partition by typing:
fastboot wipe-super super_empty.img
Flash the downloaded image files to your device by typing:
[command]fastboot flash boot boot.img[/command]
[command]fastboot flash dtbo dtbo.img[/command]
[command]fastboot flash vendor_boot vendor_boot.img[/command]
After flashing all three files, reboot to recovery from bootloader mode using volume down keys and selecting recovery mode
Format data (ignore if recovery complains about metadata type)
Click Advanced > Enter fastboot
From the fastbootd screen, Wipe super partition by typing:
fastboot wipe-super super_empty.img
Check the current slot and reboot to bootloader.
Change the slot to inactive one (If you are on slot a, then change to b) by using fastboot --set-active=a or fastboot --set-active=b
Again from the bootloader screen, Wipe super partition by typing: fastboot wipe-super super_empty.img
Reboot to recovery and check if slot is changed or not.
Click Advanced > Enter fastboot
From the fastbootd screen, Wipe super partition by typing:
fastboot wipe-super super_empty.img
Now, go back to recovery and format data
Select apply update > install using adb
Connect device to computer and type the following command by replacing with the filename of the zip
[command]adb sideload lineage***.zip[/command]
After flash completed, recovery will ask to reboot to recovery if in case u need to flash any other zips like magisk, gapps etc. Proceed accordingly
Format data once again after everything completed
Now you successfully flashed the rom. Boot into the rom and enjoy

larry.name: Revert to Stock
notes: You need to be on latest los or los based roms before proceeding
Only for installing Android 14 stock rom (OOS14)
Only use the mentioned recovery to install (Won't work with other recoveries)
Take a backup of your data as this process will erase /data partition
Follow instructions carefully for flashing
issues: Nothing found so far. Works as expected
flashingSteps: [warning]The provided instructions are for flashing this build. These will only work if you follow every section and step precisely. Do not continue after something fails![/warning]
Reboot to bootloader
Type the following command to wipe /data:
fastboot -w
Download the recovery, extract and run flash
Now your device will automatically boot into recovery.
Format data (ignore if recovery complains about metadata type)
Select apply update > install using adb
Connect device to computer and type the following command
adb sideload ***.zip (Replace with the filename of the stock rom)
Click first 2 yes and 1 no
Reboot to bootloader once after this step completes. (Don't reboot to system)
Download the partitions zip file, extract and run flash
Great! Stock rom has been installed in ur device successfully

luigi.name: LineageOS
warning: An official method of unlocking the bootloader is not available, but there may be some unofficial methods available. Unofficial methods are not recommended, so use them at your own risk! An unlocked bootloader is required to install this.
changelog: Other under the hood optimizations to dt and kernel
notes: If coming from Android 14 custom roms, then proceed to the section 'Flashing Steps If coming from previous build' and if from stock rom, then proceed to 'Flashing Steps'
In case if you face kInstallDeviceOpenError, wipe super partion with both slots using the command below and wipe data after that
fastboot wipe-super super_empty.img
Use the mentioned recovery to install
Take a backup of your data as this process will erase /data partition

Format data (ignore if recovery complains about metadata type)

After flash completed, recovery will ask to reboot to recovery if in case u need to flash any other zips like magisk, gapps etc. Proceed accordingly

oscar.name: LineageOS
warning: An official method of unlocking the bootloader is not available, but there may be some unofficial methods available. Unofficial methods are not recommended, so use them at your own risk! An unlocked bootloader is required to install this.
changelog: Fixed conference calls with Jio sim
Boost little cluster to max upon interaction
notes: Clean flash is needed
In case if you face kInstallDeviceOpenError, wipe super partion with both slots using the command below and wipe data after that
fastboot wipe-super super_empty.img
Use the mentioned recovery to install
Take a backup of your data as this process will erase /data partition

[warning]Before following these instructions please ensure that the device is currently using the latest firmware version. Otherwise flash the latest stock firmware before continuing further[/warning]
Follow instructions carefully for flashing
MindTheGapps preferred for gapps (can try others too, MTG is the tested one)
In case if you find any bugs, report with proper logs
flashingSteps: [warning]The provided instructions are for flashing this build. These will only work if you follow every section and step precisely. Do not continue after something fails![/warning]
Download all 4 files listed above (Rom, boot, dtbo, vendor_boot)
Reboot to bootloader
Flash the downloaded image files to your device by typing:
[command]fastboot flash boot boot.img[/command]
[command]fastboot flash dtbo dtbo.img[/command]
[command]fastboot flash vendor_boot vendor_boot.img[/command]
After flashing all three files, reboot to recovery from bootloader mode using volume down keys and selecting recovery mode
Connect device to computer
Go to Advanced > Enter fastboot
Now you will be in fastbootd mode. extract the downloaded firmware zip in pc
Under the firmware, there should be install.sh and install.bat files
Run install script as per your OS. (sh file if linux/ubuntu and bat if windows)
After successfull flash, reboot to recovery again
Format data (ignore if recovery complains about metadata type)
Select apply update > install using adb
Connect device to computer and type the following command by replacing with the filename of the zip
[command]adb sideload lineage***.zip[/command]
After flash completed, recovery will ask to reboot to recovery if in case u need to flash any other zips like magisk, gapps etc. Proceed accordingly
Format data once again after everything completed
Now you successfully flashed the rom. Boot into the rom and enjoy

kiev.name: Lineage OS
notes: [warning]Before following these instructions please ensure that the device is currently using the latest firmware version. Otherwise flash the latest stock firmware before continuing further[/warning]
Read official lineageos wiki carefully to understand the requirements and how to unlock bootloader
In case if you find any bugs, report with proper logs
OTA is enabled. So future updates will be available through inbuilt updater.
issues: Nothing critical so far. If you find any, then report with proper logs
flashingSteps: [warning]The provided instructions are for flashing this build. These will only work if you follow every section and step precisely. Do not continue after something fails![/warning]
Download Rom and recovery files
Reboot to bootloader
Flash the downloaded recovery image to your device by typing:
[command]fastboot flash recovery recovery.img[/command]
After flashing recovery, reboot to recovery from bootloader mode using volume down keys and selecting recovery mode
Format data
Select apply update > install using adb
Connect device to computer and type the following command by replacing with the filename of the zip
[command]adb sideload lineage***.zip[/command]
[warning]Do not format data after flashing rom since android 15 enforces FRP lock.[/warning]
After flash completed, recovery will ask to reboot to recovery if in case u need to flash any other zips like magisk, gapps etc. Proceed accordingly
Now you successfully flashed the rom. Boot into the rom and enjoy.

karate.name: LineageOS
changelog: Merged upto February 2024 security patch (Support for android 11 ended on February 2024)
notes: Since Google decided to drop providing security patches to Android 11, and enforcement of bpf from android 12 onwards, this marks the final lineageos build for karate.

karate.name: DotOS
notes: Only use the mentioned recovery to flash

kuntao.name: LineageOS
changelog: Merged upto February 2024 security patch (Support for android 11 ended on February 2024)
notes: Since Google decided to drop providing security patches to Android 11, and enforcement of bpf from android 12 onwards, this marks the final lineageos build for kuntao.
